text: why am I so obsessed with the outlier concept and why you should be too the goal of this video is to walk you through exactly that I want to level set with some basics of the outlier concept some statistics to help elucidate the point and then at the end of the video I'm going to walk you through two things some of the exact steps I took to become one and then literally quite literally a near bulletproof plan to become one if you're able to follow it which spoiler alert most people aren't but that's the goal of this video is to change the way you look at your financial well-being what's up everybody Eric here welcome back to all the outliers let's start with why I'm even talking about this well for those that don't know I grew up poor had a single mom she worked two jobs I grew up in a shitty area the same old story that's not really important because that's just a starting point however by my late 20s I was already a first generation self-made millionaire now in my early 30s I'm 32 now I'm a multi-millionaire not some big Flex it's to walk you through how changing your perspective can change your outcomes so let's get into that what's the probability of becoming a millionaire in the US it's 88.8 you might look at that and say wow that's pretty low not high so it's clearly not granted however
